data.name: AppDbgExBgaChk

data.value: Hosts file does not exists.

data.value: The import file does not exists.

data.name: AppDbgIncorrectFormLocation
data.value: Invalid form location coordinates were received: [{0}, {1}]. The form will be moved to the center of the screen.

data.name: AppDbgIncorrectFormSize
data.value: Invalid form size was received: [{0}, {1}]. The form will size will not be changed.

data.name: AppDbgModelViewColumnIndexOutOfRange
data.value: Invalid column index detected. Unable to perform the requested action!

data.value: Exception while trying to restart application with admin user rights.

data.name: AppDbgRestartAsAdminNotImplemented
data.value: Trying to restart an application on unsupported platform.

data.name: AppDbgUpDownloadFailure
data.value: Failed to download the the application update from the remote server.

data.name: AppDbgUpHashMissmatch
data.value: Failed to install the application update. The downloaded file has an incorrect hash and will be deleted.
